plot: A young veterinarian, his wife, a tiger and two orangutans live deep in the Appalachian Mountains. The vet draws parallels between the behaviors of his menagerie and those of the people who live in surrounding communities.
title: Tiger, Tiger
plot_es: A young veterinarian, his wife, a tiger and two orangutans live deep in the Appalachian Mountains. The vet draws parallels between the behaviors of his menagerie and those of the people who live in surrounding communities.
plot_en: A young veterinarian, his wife, a tiger and two orangutans live deep in the Appalachian Mountains. The vet draws parallels between the behaviors of his menagerie and those of the people who live in surrounding communities.
